resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105391</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105391</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206425</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">African Voices</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Afrikanische Stimmen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voix Africaines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vozes Africanas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Voci Africane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφρικανικές φωνές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Voces Africanas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">explores the diversity of Africa's cultures and their influence on work, family, and community. Sculptures, textiles, interviews, proverbs, prayers, folk tales, and songs are included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erforscht die Verschiedenartigkeit von Kulturen 
und von ihrem Einfluß Afrikas auf Arbeit, Familie und Gemeinschaft. 
Skulpturen, Gewebe, Interviews, Sprichwörter, Gebete, 
Volksgeschichten und Liede sind enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explore la diversité des cultures et de leur 
influence de l'Afrique sur le travail, la famille, et la communauté. 
Les sculptures, les textiles, les entrevues, les proverbes, les 
prières, les contes folkloriques, et les chansons sont inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explora a diversidade de sua influência de 
África de culturas e no trabalho, na família, e na comunidade. 
Os sculptures, os textiles, as entrevistas, os proverbs, os 
prayers, os tales populares, e as canções são incluídos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esplora la diversità delle colture e della loro 
influenza dell'Africa su lavoro, sulla famiglia e sulla Comunità. 
Le sculture, le tessile, le interviste, i proverbi, le 
preghiere, i racconti pieghi e le canzoni sono inclusi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερευνά την ποικιλομορφία των πολιτιστικών συνηθειών 
της Αφρικής και της επιρροής τους στην εργασία, την οικογένεια, 
και την κοινότητα. Τα γλυπτά, τα κλωστοϋφαντουργικά 
προϊόντα, οι συνεντεύξεις, οι παροιμίες, οι προσευχές, οι 
λαϊκές ιστορίες, και τα τραγούδια συμπεριλαμβάνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explora la diversidad de las culturas y de su 
influencia de África en trabajo, la familia, y la comunidad. 
Las esculturas, los textiles, las entrevistas, los proverbios, 
los rezos, los cuentos populares, y las canciones son incluidos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206425</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105391</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/african-voices</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
